# Data process


## Finland

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

| **Name** | `FB05` |
|-|-|
| **Label** | `Do you smoke nowadays (cigarettes, cigars or pipe)` |
| **Table name** | `t00_athlos_2017_02_23` |
| **Categories:**| `1 = daily` <br/> `2 = occasionally` <br/> `3 = not at all` |
| **Missings:**|`NA`|
| **Description** |  |


```{r assign w1, echo=F}
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'Health20002011_w1','Health2000-2011.t00_athlos_2017_02_23', variables=list('FB05'), missings = TRUE)
Health20002011_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'Health20002011_w1')
```

```{r local w1, echo=F}
vbl <- Health20002011_w1$FB05
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = names(Health20002011_w1)[2])
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(Health20002011_w1, aes(x=factor(FB05))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `current_smoking` from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `2 into 1`
* `3 into 0`
* `NA into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo w1}
Health20002011_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=Health20002011_w1$id)
Health20002011_ds_w1$current_smoking <- car::recode(Health20002011_w1$FB05, "2 = 1;3 = 0;NA = 999 ")
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w1, echo=F}
vbl <- Health20002011_ds_w1$current_smoking
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(Health20002011_ds_w1, aes(x=factor(current_smoking))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation w1, echo=F}
AfterH <- table(Health20002011_ds_w1$current_smoking)
X<-table(Health20002011_w1$FB05)
BeforeH <- c(X[3],sum(X[1:2]),sum(is.na(Health20002011_w1$FB05)))
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("3->0","1,2->1","NA->999") 
kable(C)
```

```{r final, echo=F}

l.hds <- list(w1 = Health20002011_ds_w1, w2 = Health20002011_ds_w2)

for(name in names(l.hds)) {
  aux_object <- l.hds[[name]]
  label(l.hds[[name]][[2]]) <- label(aux_object[[2]]) <- ds_label # Text value assigned at the DS description, at the top
  l.hds[[name]][[2]] <- labelled(l.hds[[name]][[2]], labels = cat_label)
  aux_object[[2]] <- car::recode(aux_object[[2]], "miss_values_vector=NA")
  aux_object[[2]] <- labelled(aux_object[[2]], labels = cat_label[1:2])
  m_name <- paste0("Health20002011_m_ds_",name)
  assign(m_name, aux_object)
  rm(aux_object)
}

```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

Two tables are generated: 

1. Percentages of categories in each harmonised variable.

2. Frequencies and percentages of individuals with different trajectories.


```{r summ}

t.hds <- frq(l.hds[[1]][2])[[1]][,c(1,2)] 
for (i in seq_along(l.hds)){
  t.hds[2+i] <- frq(l.hds[[i]][2])[[1]][,4] 
}
t.hds[13,] <- c("n", "sample size", sapply(l.hds,function(wave) length(wave[[1]]))
             )
names(t.hds)<-c("val", "label",names(l.hds))
kable(t.hds)

dbb <- get(paste0("Health20002011_m_ds_",names(l.hds)[1]))[,c("id","current_smoking")]
for(ind in 2:length(l.hds)){
  dbb <- merge(dbb, get(paste0("Health20002011_m_ds_",names(l.hds)[ind]))[,c("id","current_smoking")], by = "id", suffixes = c("", paste0(".",names(l.hds)[ind])), all = T)
}
names(dbb) <- c("id", names(l.hds))

v.dbb <- dbb[,2]
for(ind in 2:length(l.hds)){
  v.dbb <- paste(v.dbb,dbb[,ind+1],sep="")
}
f.dbb <- frq(v.dbb)[[1]][,c(1,2,4)]
kable(f.dbb)

```
